text:
Tigerspike | Mobile Developers (iOS & Android) | Goodge St, London | https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike is a global Digital Products company established in 2003. We now have over 350 employees across 9 offices worldwide. We focus on code quality, working towards TDD in 10-day sprints and following Clean code architecture and SOLID principles. We work with the latest tech on both global enterprise and small consumer apps (90% native mobile) with the aim to change people's lives through technology.

Please email michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com for more info or apply here: Senior iOS: http://bit.ly/2xPZfjH Senior Android: http://bit.ly/2xN6ite
